9c282481f31b4761e6f4b8b0091b96331cd1a5dbb2f135db110289caab4fcc1b kernel-firmware-3.10.68-11.el6.centos.alt.noarch.rpm

========================================================================

These updates address the following issues:

e1000e:

Just a rebuild of the module for the new kernel.

Subject: [CentOS-announce] CESA-2015:C002 CentOS-7 centos-release BugFix
	Update
Message-ID: <20150220160922.GA1711@n04.lon1.karan.org>

CentOS Errata and BugFix Advisory 2015:C002


The following updated files have been uploaded and are currently 
syncing to the mirrors: ( sha256sum Filename ) 

x86_64:
89a6d526f11d2544adedaa554e010b772b644395689c5e246ef54f8205352741 centos-release-7-0.1406.el7.centos.2.6.x86_64.rpm

Source:
f2686a700e7c21c9117d2f418a1260c2cc80e4180c62ecf10544b3b1c85c9eac centos-release-7-0.1406.el7.centos.2.6.src.rpm


NOTE: This update adds CentOS-CR.repo to /etc/yum.repos.d/ .  It is disabled
by default.  If you want to enable the CR repo for future updates, then edit
/etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-CR.repo and set the [cr] repo from enabled=0 to
enabled=1.

For more information on the CentOS CR repository, see:

http://wiki.centos.org/AdditionalResources/Repositories/CR

-- 
Johnny Hughes
CentOS Project { http://www.centos.org/ }
